mapper.select:
SELECT id, con_ip, con_dbname, execute_sql, execute_result, execute_msg, execute_user, create_time, create_user FROM tb_dataops_logs WHERE del_flag =1
AND con_dbname LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR execute_sql LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR execute_user LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
or execute_result = 200
or execute_result = 500
